reviews.text: We stayed here a Saturday evening in April. According to the hotel it's Germany's oldest "gasthof".
reviews.title: Great historic place
A bit of History
reviews.text: The hotel is fantastic, very old and beautiful building. Being an old building the rooms are smallish, but very well appointed. We guessed that the room had has an interior decorator to do it up. The fabric/weave on one wall and the roof of the four poster bed, was matched with the walls. But the older woman who runs the hotel had added "personal" touches, such as angels, dried and plastic flowers.
